item.title: Collingwood season preview: Can Magpies defy history and go back-to-back?
item.description: It's been almost 90 years since Collingwood was able to win consecutive premierships, but could 2024 be the year the Magpies break that drought?

item.title: Crows ruck coach to step down to focus on AFLW coaching role
item.description: Matthew Clarke has relinquished his ruck coach role with the men's team to allow him to focus on the AFLW program

item.title: 'Phenomenal' Suns forward had Dimma marvelling before injury setback
item.description: Damien Hardwick has been blown away by the talent at the Suns and says reaching finals should be the bare minimum in his first season at the helm

item.title: Blues to take 'no risks' with Walsh, forward in doubt for Lions clash
item.description: Sam Walsh has been placed on a modified training program after experiencing back soreness

item.title: Dees undecided on troubled star ahead of Opening Round
item.description: Max Gawn says he's comfortable with Clayton Oliver playing in their season opener against Sydney, or sitting out the game
